message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
You can't be serious with an even split, let's give me a bit more!
You're being greedy, I'll give you a bit less than 50%
You're not giving me enough, I want more!
Let's meet in the middle, I'll give you a 50-50 split
You're still not giving me enough, I'm not budging!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect me to give away the farm
I'm not going to get taken advantage of, I'm taking control!
I'll give you a fair deal, let's end this and move on
I'm not falling for the same old trick again, I'm going for the win!
I'm not giving up, I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with everything
It's now or never, take it or leave it!
